BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH = "opco/fdln/domain/store/retailer-cpt-zip-lat-long/lake/2023-07-19-12-03-42/"
STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-zip-lat-long/stage/"
TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/store/retailer-cpt-zip-lat-long/master/"
KEY_COL="zip_cd"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD= 2
OPCO_LST = ["ppod", "fdln", "hnfd", "stsh", "gntl", "gntc", "mrtn"]

logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - STORE - RETAILER - CPT_ZIP_LAT_LONG - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, DoubleType, StringType,TimestampType, IntegerType, LongType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("zip_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("cntr_lat_qy", DoubleType(), False),
    StructField("cntr_long_qy", DoubleType(), False)
    ])
logger.debug("schema-defination : Defined the schema for retailer:cpt_zip_lat_long.\n {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_SCHEMA))

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp,lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH))

df_zip_lat_long_lake = spark \
    .read \
    .format("parquet") \
    .schema(STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_SCHEMA) \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt__cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) 

df_zip_lat_long_lake\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .format("delta") \
        .option("inferSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH)
logger.info("stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH, STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH, df_zip_lat_long_lake.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import count_distinct, col

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .save(path)    
    logger.info("RETAILER:CPT_ZIP_LAT_LONG Master data overwritten.OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))

# main starts here
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("_________________________________________________________________")
    logger.info("Processing  MDM for RETAILER:CPT_ZIP_LAT_LONG. OPCO={0}".format(opco))
    df_zip_lat_long_stage= spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH)
    logger.info("RETAILER:CPT_ZIP_LAT_LONG loaded from stage. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_zip_lat_long_stage.count()))
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH.format(opco = opco))): 
        df_zip_lat_long_master= spark \
            .read \
            .format("delta") \
            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH.format(opco = opco))
        logger.info("RETAILER:CPT_ZIP_LAT_LONG loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_zip_lat_long_master.count()))
        is_val_success= validate_count(df_zip_lat_long_master,df_zip_lat_long_stage,VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)
        if is_val_success :
            load_master_data(df_zip_lat_long_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
        else:
            logger.error("\t Failed to override master since threshold is exceding ")
            raise Exception("EXCEEDING_THRESHOLD")        
    else:
        logger.info('First Time Master Load')
        load_master_data(df_zip_lat_long_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ZIP_LAT_LONG_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
